name: Personas + User Stories
description:
Ever feel like you're losing context of who is doing what in your designs as you build out elaborate flows that permeate across different user groups?


I made this template to add indicators of your persona, a quick user story and how to effectively write these to help communicate your designs even more effectively.


Feel free to duplicate the template and make it your own!

Wanna share some feedback? Hit me up on twitter @astr0mnaut.


Wanna build useful personas? Check out Personify, the app I built just for that purpose!
